entry.title: abualgait/AppStarter
entry.summary:

Built with Jetpack Compose, it features use cases, repositories, Retrofit for networking, Room for local storage, and a versatile theming system.

ğŸš€ Clean Architecture App Starter ğŸŒ

Jumpstart your app development journey with this GitHub repository that follows clean architecture principles. Powered by Jetpack Compose, it seamlessly integrates use cases, repositories, Retrofit for network requests, Room for local storage, and a flexible theming system. This starter provides a modular and scalable foundation for your Android app. Happy coding! ğŸš€ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ’»ğŸ‘¨â€ğŸ’»

Built using:

  • Kotlin
  • MVVM Clean Architecture
  • Compose UI
  • Retrofit2 & OkHttp3
  • Room Database
  • Hilt DI
  • Use cases
  • Unit Testing
  • Kotlin Flow
  • Compose State
